020package org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal;
021
022import static java.util.Collections.reverse;
023import static java.util.function.Function.identity;
024import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.DEPRECATED;
025import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
026import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.EMPTY_STRING;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.checkState;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.isNull;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireValidArgument;
034import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
035
036import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
037import javax.lang.model.element.PackageElement;
038import javax.lang.model.element.TypeElement;
039import javax.lang.model.util.SimpleElementVisitor9;
040import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
041import java.util.ArrayList;
042import java.util.List;
043import java.util.Map;
044import java.util.Optional;
045
046import org.apiguardian.api.API;
047import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
048import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.ValidationException;
049import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.AnnotationSpec;
050import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.ClassName;
051
052/**
053 *  The implementation of
054 *  {@link ClassName}
055 *  for a fully-qualified class name for top-level and member classes.
056 *
057 *  @modified Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
058 *  @version $Id: ClassNameImpl.java 997 2022-01-26 14:55:05Z tquadrat $
059 *  @since 0.0.5
060 *
061 *  @UMLGraph.link
062 */
063@SuppressWarnings( {"ClassWithTooManyFields", "ComparableImplementedButEqualsNotOverridden"} )
064@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ClassNameImpl.java 997 2022-01-26 14:55:05Z tquadrat $" )
065@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
066public final class ClassNameImpl extends TypeNameImpl implements ClassName
067{
068        /*-----------*\
069    ====** Constants **========================================================
070        \*-----------*/
071    /**
072     *  The class name for
073     *  {@link Boolean}.
074     */
075    public static final ClassNameImpl BOXED_BOOLEAN = get( Boolean.class );
076
077    /**
078     *  The class name for
079     *  {@link Byte}.
080     */
081    public static final ClassNameImpl BOXED_BYTE = get( Byte.class );
082
083    /**
084     *  The class name for
085     *  {@link Character}.
086     */
087    public static final ClassNameImpl BOXED_CHAR = get( Character.class );
088
089    /**
090     *  The class name for
091     *  {@link Double}.
092     */
093    public static final ClassNameImpl BOXED_DOUBLE = get( Double.class );
094
095    /**
096     *  The class name for
097     *  {@link Float}.
098     */
099    public static final ClassNameImpl BOXED_FLOAT = get( Float.class );
100
101    /**
102     *  The class name for
103     *  {@link Integer}.
104     */
105    public static final ClassNameImpl BOXED_INT = get( Integer.class );
106
107    /**
108     *  The class name for
109     *  {@link Long}.
110     */
111    public static final ClassNameImpl BOXED_LONG = get( Long.class );
112
113    /**
114     *  The class name for
115     *  {@link Short}.
116     */
117    public static final ClassNameImpl BOXED_SHORT = get( Short.class );
118
119    /**
120     *  The class name for
121     *  {@link Void}.
122     */
123    public static final ClassNameImpl BOXED_VOID = get( Void.class );
124
125    /**
126     *  The class name for
127     *  {@link Object}.
128     */
129    public static final ClassNameImpl OBJECT = get( Object.class );
130
131        /*------------*\
132    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
133        \*------------*/
134    /**
135     *  The full class name like {@code java.util.Map.Entry}.
136     */
137    private final String m_CanonicalName;
138
139    /**
140     *  The enclosing class, or empty if this is not enclosed in another class.
141     */
142    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
143    private final Optional<ClassNameImpl> m_EnclosingClassName;
144
145    /**
146     * The package name of this class, or the empty String if this is in the
147     * default package.
148     */
149    private final String m_PackageName;
150
151    /**
152     *  The name for this class name, like {@code Entry} for
153     *  {@code java.util.Map.Entry}.
154     */
155    private final String m_SimpleName;
156
157        /*--------------*\
158    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
159        \*--------------*/
160    /**
161     *  Creates a new {@code ClassNameImpl} instance.
162     *
163     *  @param  packageName The name of the package for the new class name.
164     *  @param  enclosingClassName  The name of the enclosing class; can be
165     *      {@code null} in case of a top level class.
166     *  @param  simpleName  The name of the class.
167     */
168    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
169    public ClassNameImpl( final CharSequence packageName, final ClassNameImpl enclosingClassName, final CharSequence simpleName )
170    {
171        this( packageName, enclosingClassName, simpleName, List.of() );
172    }   //  ClassNameImpl()
173
174    /**
175     *  Creates a new {@code ClassNameImpl} instance.
176     *
177     *  @param  packageName The name of the package for the new class name.
178     *  @param  enclosingClassName  The name of the enclosing class; can be
179     *      empty in case of a top level class.
180     *  @param  simpleName  The name of the class.
181     */
182    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
183    public ClassNameImpl( final CharSequence packageName, final Optional<ClassNameImpl> enclosingClassName, final CharSequence simpleName )
184    {
185        this( packageName, enclosingClassName, simpleName, List.of() );
186    }   //  ClassNameImpl()
187
188    /**
189     *  Creates a new {@code ClassNameImpl} instance.
190     *
191     *  @param  packageName The name of the package for the new class name.
192     *  @param  enclosingClassName  The name of the enclosing class; can be
193     *      {@code null} in case of a top level class.
194     *  @param  simpleName  The name of the class.
195     *  @param  annotations The annotations for this class name.
196     */
197    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
198    public ClassNameImpl( final CharSequence packageName, final ClassNameImpl enclosingClassName, final CharSequence simpleName, final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> annotations )
199    {
200        this( packageName, Optional.ofNullable( enclosingClassName ), simpleName, annotations );
201    }   //  ClassNameImpl()
202
203    /**
204     *  Creates a new {@code ClassNameImpl} instance.
205     *
206     *  @param  packageName The name of the package for the new class name.
207     *  @param  enclosingClassName  The name of the enclosing class.
208     *  @param  simpleName  The name of the class.
209     *  @param  annotations The annotations for this class name.
210     */
211    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
212    public ClassNameImpl( final CharSequence packageName, final Optional<ClassNameImpl> enclosingClassName, final CharSequence simpleName, final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> annotations )
213    {
214        super( annotations );
215        m_PackageName = requireNonNullArgument( packageName, "packageName" ).toString().intern();
216        m_EnclosingClassName = requireNonNullArgument( enclosingClassName, "enclosingClassName" );
217        m_SimpleName = requireNotEmptyArgument( simpleName, "simpleName" ).toString().intern();
218        m_CanonicalName = enclosingClassName.map( className -> (className.m_CanonicalName + '.' + m_SimpleName) )
219            .orElseGet( () ->
220                m_PackageName.isEmpty()
221                ? m_SimpleName
222                : m_PackageName + '.' + m_SimpleName
223            );
224    }   //  ClassNameImpl()
225
226        /*---------*\
227    ====** Methods **==========================================================
228        \*---------*/
229    /**
230     *  {@inheritDoc}
231     */
232    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
233    @Override
234    public final ClassNameImpl annotated( final List<AnnotationSpec> annotations )
235    {
236        return new ClassNameImpl( m_PackageName, m_EnclosingClassName, m_SimpleName, concatAnnotations( annotations ) );
237    }   //  annotated()
238
239    /**
240     *  Returns a new {@code ClassName} instance for the given fully-qualified
241     *  class name string. This method assumes that the input is ASCII and
242     *  follows typical Java style (lowercase package names, UpperCamelCase
243     *  class names) and may produce incorrect results or throw
244     *  {@link IllegalArgumentException}
245     *  otherwise. For that reason,
246     *  {@link #get(Class)},
247     *  {@link #get(CharSequence,CharSequence,CharSequence...)},
248     *  and
249     *  {@link #get(TypeElement)}
250     *  should be preferred as they can correctly create {@code ClassName}
251     *  instances without such restrictions.
252     *
253     *  @param  className   The fully qualified class name.
254     *  @return The new class name instance.
255     *
256     *  @deprecated Because of the limitations described above, this method is
257     *      seen as inherently unsafe, and therefore it was decided to
258     *      deprecate it.
259     */
260    @Deprecated( since = "0.1.0" )
261    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
262    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
263    public static final ClassNameImpl bestGuess( final CharSequence className )
264    {
265        final var classNameString = requireNotEmptyArgument( className, "className" ).toString().intern();
266        /*
267         * Add the package name, like "java.util.concurrent", or "" for no
268         * package.
269         */
270        var p = 0;
271        while( p < classNameString.length() && Character.isLowerCase( classNameString.codePointAt( p ) ) )
272        {
273            p = classNameString.indexOf( '.', p ) + 1;
274            checkState( p != 0, () -> new ValidationException( format( "couldn't make a guess for %s", classNameString ) ) );
275        }
276        final var packageName = p == 0 ? EMPTY_STRING : classNameString.substring( 0, p - 1 );
277
278        //---* Add class names like "Map" and "Entry" *------------------------
279        ClassNameImpl retValue = null;
280        for( final var simpleName : classNameString.substring( p ).split( "\\.", -1 ) )
281        {
282            checkState( !simpleName.isEmpty() && Character.isUpperCase( simpleName.codePointAt( 0 ) ), () -> new ValidationException( format( "couldn't make a guess for %s", classNameString ) ) );
283            retValue = new ClassNameImpl( packageName, retValue, simpleName );
284        }
285
286        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
287        return retValue;
288    }   //  bestGuess()
289
290    /**
291     *  {@inheritDoc}
292     */
293    @Override
294    public final int compareTo( final ClassName o ) { return canonicalName().compareTo( o.canonicalName() ); }
295
296    /**
297     *  {@inheritDoc}
298     */
299    @Override
300    public final String canonicalName() { return m_CanonicalName; }
301
302    /**
303     *  {@inheritDoc}
304     */
305    @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
306    @Override
307    public final CodeWriter emit( final CodeWriter out ) throws UncheckedIOException
308    {
309        final var retValue = requireNonNullArgument( out, "out" );
310        var charsEmitted = false;
311        for( final var className : enclosingClasses() )
312        {
313            final String simpleName;
314            if( charsEmitted )
315            {
316                //---* An enclosing class was already emitted *----------------
317                retValue.emit( "." );
318                simpleName = className.m_SimpleName;
319
320            }
321            else if( className.isAnnotated() || className == this )
322            {
323                /*
324                 * We encountered the first enclosing class that must be
325                 * emitted.
326                 */
327                final var qualifiedName = retValue.lookupName( className );
328                final var dot = qualifiedName.lastIndexOf( '.' );
329                if( dot != -1 )
330                {
331                    retValue.emitAndIndent( qualifiedName.substring( 0, dot + 1 ) );
332                    simpleName = qualifiedName.substring( dot + 1 );
333                    charsEmitted = true;
334                }
335                else
336                {
337                    simpleName = qualifiedName;
338                }
339
340            }
341            else
342            {
343                /*
344                 * Don't emit this enclosing type. Keep going so we can be more
345                 * precise.
346                 */
347                continue;
348            }
349
350            if( className.isAnnotated() )
351            {
352                if( charsEmitted ) retValue.emit( " " );
353                className.emitAnnotations( retValue );
354            }
355
356            retValue.emit( simpleName );
357            charsEmitted = true;
358        }
359
360
361        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
362        return retValue;
363    }   //  emit()
364
365    /**
366     *  Returns all enclosing classes in {@code this}, outermost first.
367     *
368     *  @return The enclosing classes.
369     */
370    private final List<ClassNameImpl> enclosingClasses()
371    {
372        final List<ClassNameImpl> retValue = new ArrayList<>();
373        for( var c = this; nonNull( c ); c = c.m_EnclosingClassName.orElse( null ) )
374        {
375            retValue.add( c );
376        }
377        reverse( retValue );
378
379        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
380        return retValue;
381    }   //  enclosingClasses()
382
383    /**
384     *  Returns the enclosing class, like {@link Map} for
385     *  {@code java.util.Map.Entry}. The return value will be
386     *  {@linkplain Optional#empty() empty}
387     *  if this class is not nested in another class.
388     *
389     *  @return An instance of
390     *      {@link Optional}
391     *      that holds the name of the enclosing class.
392     */
393    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
394    public final Optional<ClassNameImpl> enclosingClassName() { return m_EnclosingClassName; }
395
396    /**
397     *  Creates a new {@code ClassName} instance from an instance of
398     *  {@link Class}.
399     *
400     *  @param  sourceClass The instance of {@code java.lang.Class}.
401     *  @return The respective instance of {@code ClassName}.
402     */
403    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
404    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
405    public static final ClassNameImpl from( final Class<?> sourceClass )
406    {
407        var c = requireNonNullArgument( sourceClass, "sourceClass" );
408        requireValidArgument( c, "sourceClass", v -> !v.isPrimitive(), $ -> "primitive types cannot be represented as a ClassName" );
409        requireValidArgument( c, "sourceClass", v -> !void.class.equals( v ), $ -> "'void' type cannot be represented as a ClassName" );
410        requireValidArgument( c, "sourceClass", v -> !v.isArray(), $ -> "array types cannot be represented as a ClassName" );
411
412        final ClassNameImpl retValue;
413        var anonymousSuffix = EMPTY_STRING;
414        while( c.isAnonymousClass() )
415        {
416            final var lastDollar = c.getName().lastIndexOf( '$' );
417            //noinspection CallToStringConcatCanBeReplacedByOperator
418            anonymousSuffix = c.getName().substring( lastDollar ).concat( anonymousSuffix );
419            c = c.getEnclosingClass();
420        }
421        final var name = c.getSimpleName() + anonymousSuffix;
422
423        if( isNull( c.getEnclosingClass() ) )
424        {
425            /*
426             * Avoid unreliable Class.getPackage():
427             * https://github.com/square/javapoet/issues/295
428             */
429            final var lastDot = c.getName().lastIndexOf( '.' );
430            final var packageName = (lastDot < 0) ? null : c.getName().substring( 0, lastDot );
431            retValue = new ClassNameImpl( packageName, Optional.empty(), name );
432        }
433        else
434        {
435            retValue = get( c.getEnclosingClass() ).nestedClass( name );
436        }
437
438        // ---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
439        return retValue;
440    }   //  from()
441
442    /**
443     *  Returns the class name for the given
444     *  {@link TypeElement}
445     *  instance.
446     *
447     *  @param  element The type element instance.
448     *  @return The new class name instance.
449     */
450    @SuppressWarnings( {"AnonymousInnerClassWithTooManyMethods", "OverlyComplexAnonymousInnerClass", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
451    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
452    public static final ClassNameImpl from( final TypeElement element )
453    {
454        final var simpleName = requireNonNullArgument( element, "element" ).getSimpleName().toString();
455
456        final var retValue = element.getEnclosingElement().accept( new SimpleElementVisitor9<ClassNameImpl,Void>()
457        {
458            /**
459             *  {@inheritDoc}
460             */
461            @Override
462            public final ClassNameImpl visitPackage( final PackageElement packageElement, final Void p )
463            {
464                return new ClassNameImpl( packageElement.getQualifiedName().toString(), Optional.empty(), simpleName );
465            }   //  visitPackage()
466
467            /**
468             *  {@inheritDoc}
469             */
470            @Override
471            public final ClassNameImpl visitType( final TypeElement enclosingClass, final Void p )
472            {
473                return from( enclosingClass ).nestedClass( simpleName );
474            }   //  visitType()
475
476            /**
477             *  {@inheritDoc}
478             */
479            @Override
480            public final ClassNameImpl visitUnknown( final Element unknown, final Void p )
481            {
482                return from( EMPTY_STRING, simpleName );
483            }   //  visitUnknown()
484
485            /**
486             *  {@inheritDoc}
487             */
488            @Override
489            public final ClassNameImpl defaultAction( final Element enclosingElement, final Void p )
490            {
491                throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Unexpected type nesting: " + element );
492            }   //  defaultAction()
493        }, null );
494
495        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
496        return retValue;
497    }   //  from()
498
499    /**
500     *  Returns a class name created from the given parts.<br>
501     *  <br>For example, calling this method with package name
502     *  {@code "java.util"} and simple names {@code "Map"} and {@code "Entry"}
503     *  yields {@code java.util.Map.Entry}.
504     *
505     *  @param  packageName The package name.
506     *  @param  simpleName  The name of the top-level class.
507     *  @param  simpleNames The names of the nested classes, from outer to
508     *      inner.
509     *  @return The new {@code ClassName} instance.
510     */
511    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
512    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
513    public static final ClassNameImpl from( final CharSequence packageName, final CharSequence simpleName, final CharSequence... simpleNames )
514    {
515        var retValue = new ClassNameImpl( packageName, Optional.empty(), simpleName );
516        for( final var name : simpleNames )
517        {
518            retValue = retValue.nestedClass( name );
519        }
520
521        // ---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
522        return retValue;
523    }   //  from()
524
525    /**
526     *  Creates a new {@code ClassName} instance from an instance of
527     *  {@link Class}.
528     *
529     *  @param  sourceClass The instance of {@code java.lang.Class}.
530     *  @return The respective instance of {@code ClassName}.
531     *
532     *  @deprecated Use
533     *      {@link #from(Class)}
534     *      instead.
535     */
536    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
537    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
538    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
539    public static final ClassNameImpl get( final Class<?> sourceClass ) { return from( sourceClass ); }
540
541    /**
542     *  Returns the class name for the given
543     *  {@link TypeElement}
544     *  instance.
545     *
546     *  @param  element The type element instance.
547     *  @return The new class name instance.
548     *
549     *  @deprecated Use
550     *      {@link #from(TypeElement)}
551     *      instead.
552     */
553    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
554    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
555    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
556    public static final ClassNameImpl get( final TypeElement element ) { return from( element ); }
557
558    /**
559     *  Returns a class name created from the given parts.<br>
560     *  <br>For example, calling this method with package name
561     *  {@code "java.util"} and simple names {@code "Map"} and {@code "Entry"}
562     *  yields {@code java.util.Map.Entry}.
563     *
564     *  @param  packageName The package name.
565     *  @param  simpleName  The name of the top-level class.
566     *  @param  simpleNames The names of the nested classes, from outer to
567     *      inner.
568     *  @return The new {@code ClassName} instance.
569     *
570     *  @deprecated Use
571     *      {@link #from(CharSequence, CharSequence, CharSequence...)}
572     *      instead.
573     */
574    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
575    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
576    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
577    public static final ClassNameImpl get( final CharSequence packageName, final CharSequence simpleName, final CharSequence... simpleNames )
578    {
579        final var retValue = from( packageName, simpleName, simpleNames );
580
581        // ---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
582        return retValue;
583    }   //  get()
584
585    /**
586     *  {@inheritDoc}
587     */
588    @Override
589    public final boolean isAnnotated()
590    {
591        final var retValue = super.isAnnotated() || (m_EnclosingClassName.isPresent() && m_EnclosingClassName.get().isAnnotated());
592
593        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
594        return retValue;
595    }   //  isAnnotated()
596
597    /**
598     *  {@inheritDoc}
599     */
600    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
601    @Override
602    public final ClassNameImpl nestedClass( final CharSequence name )
603    {
604        final var retValue = new ClassNameImpl( m_PackageName, this, requireNotEmptyArgument( name, "name" ) );
605
606        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
607        return retValue;
608    }   //  nestedClass()
609
610    /**
611     *  {@inheritDoc}
612     */
613    @Override
614    public final String packageName() { return m_PackageName; }
615
616    /**
617     *  {@inheritDoc}
618     */
619    @Override
620    public final Optional<ClassName> parentClass() { return m_EnclosingClassName.map( identity() ); }
621
622    /**
623     *  {@inheritDoc} If
624     *  this class is enclosed by another class, this is equivalent to
625     *  {@link #enclosingClassName()}.{@link Optional#get()}.{@link #nestedClass(CharSequence) nestedClass(name)}.
626     *  Otherwise, it is equivalent to
627     *  {@link #get(CharSequence,CharSequence,CharSequence...) get(packageName(),name)}.
628     */
629    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
630    @Override
631    public final ClassNameImpl peerClass( final CharSequence name )
632    {
633        final var retValue = new ClassNameImpl( m_PackageName, m_EnclosingClassName, requireNotEmptyArgument( name, "name" ) );
634
635        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
636        return retValue;
637    }   //   peerClass()
638
639    /**
640     *  {@inheritDoc}
641     */
642    @Override
643    public final String reflectionName()
644    {
645        final var retValue = m_EnclosingClassName.map( c -> c.reflectionName() + '$' + m_SimpleName )
646            .orElse( m_PackageName.isEmpty() ? m_SimpleName : m_PackageName + '.' + m_SimpleName );
647
648        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
649        return retValue;
650    }   //  reflectionName()
651
652    /**
653     *  {@inheritDoc}
654     */
655    @Override
656    public final String simpleName() { return m_SimpleName; }
657
658    /**
659     *  {@inheritDoc}
660     */
661    @Override
662    public final List<String> simpleNames()
663    {
664        final List<String> retValue = new ArrayList<>();
665        m_EnclosingClassName.ifPresent( c -> retValue.addAll( c.simpleNames() ) );
666        retValue.add( m_SimpleName );
667
668        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
669        return retValue;
670    }   //  simpleNames()
671
672    /**
673     *  {@inheritDoc} Equivalent to chained calls to
674     *  {@link #enclosingClassName()}
675     *  until the result's enclosing class is not present.
676     */
677    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
678    @Override
679    public final ClassNameImpl topLevelClassName()
680    {
681        final var retValue = m_EnclosingClassName.map( ClassNameImpl::topLevelClassName ).orElse( this );
682
683        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
684        return retValue;
685    }   //  topLevelClassName
686
687    /**
688     *  {@inheritDoc}
689     */
690    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
691    @Override
692    public final ClassNameImpl withoutAnnotations()
693    {
694        var retValue = this;
695        if( isAnnotated() )
696        {
697            final var resultEnclosingClassName = m_EnclosingClassName.map( ClassNameImpl::withoutAnnotations ).orElse( null );
698            retValue = new ClassNameImpl( m_PackageName, resultEnclosingClassName, m_SimpleName );
699        }
700
701        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
702        return retValue;
703    }   //  withoutAnnotations()
704}
705//  class ClassNameImpl
706
707/*
708 *  End of File
709 */
